User prefers communication in Portuguese (PT-BR) and has specific preferences for code organization and visual design.

Language Preference:

- Primary communication: Portuguese (Brazil)
- Code and documentation: English (standard)
- User frequently uses "Não" (no) and gives direct, concise instructions

Communication Style:

- Direct and specific feedback
- Provides visual references (images) when explaining requirements
- Emphasizes precision: "Está errado. Analise novamente..."
- Appreciates structured plans before implementation

Work Style:

- Prefers to see plans before execution
- Values component organization and best practices
- Concerned about production security (no mock data in prod)
- Likes clean separation of concerns
